name: BotPenguin
description:
BotPenguin is the generative AI-powered, no-code chatbot builder that aims to provide uniquely crafted intelligent chatbot solutions for lead generation, appointment booking, customer support, and more, that cater to your business needs. 
With over 80+ third-party native app integrations. BotPenguin serves, over 40000+ businesses worldwide providing seamless integration across multiple channels like WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook with a unified inbox. Enable live chat support across all channels to handle customer queries efficiently. 
Thread the path of Automation with BotPenguin to improve efficiency, reduce cost, save time, and provide a better customer experience.
focus_areas: AI Bot Training: Enhance customer engagement by giving your AI chatbot a custom personality and training it on your data.
Marketing Automation: Effortlessly execute Broadcasts and Drip Campaigns via WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram to generate more leads
Appointment Bookings: Enable direct appointment bookings through the bot.
